p: Your sweet letter is at hand and I want to write at once to tell you that the plan for any of to come up to St Louis has been entirely discarded - We cannot afford it.
So many thank dear for all your and Ollies' goodness.
I had a fear Alic might not get off at the right place - things look so different at night.
I'll write more later - are very busy with a number of things -
Amama has just made Max her chocolate cake and it is a marvel-
P.S. Will you all celebrate Xmas together at your home? I'd love to think of that being so!
